start.text: Time to earn our paychecks people!
All systems green, time to show them what we're made of!
Once we're done and paid, I'm going to buy myself a new set of iridiscent scales and no one's going to stop me!

start_boss.text: That's a big one for sure.
I could use some more action right now, sure, no big deal.
Who said I'm afraid? I'm not!
What?! No, my tail isn't twitching out of fear! I'm just excited, that's all!

engaged.text: Engaging the enemy, make them run!
I'm legally bound not to say anything about leaving no prisoners!
I can sense your fear with my antennae!
Come on, suckers, show us what you've got!
Let's go! Bite their freaking faces off! Figuratively, I mean. I think I do...

retreat.text: No war was won without retreating at least once!
Don't think you've won this one, we'll be back, just you wait!

out_of_missiles.text: Missiles out. Just means we'll have to get in closer!

need_help.text: Requesting support! We're in a bit of a trouble here!
Help needed, we're getting our asses handed to us here!
You know, I wouldn't mind having some bloody HELP here!

pursuing.text: I swear I can smell they fear, it's time to hunt...
Chase them down! Rip them all apart like cattle!
Wish I could test my new poison glands on them. Will have to do it the good old way I guess!
I'm literally salivating right now. My fangs are aching...
I wonder how their flesh would taste... Wait, what did I just say?
I can feel the adrenaline in my veins. Those carvnivore genemods sure are paying off!
Too bad I can't sink my claws into them myself... Oh well, full speed ahead, make them regret showing their backs to us!

running.text: Disengaging at full speed! What? We're not retreating! YOU're retreating!

hull_90.text: So, you want to play? Alright then, bring it on!
No fun without a proper fight!
Being attacked by the enemy! Can handle it for now though!
Ha, didn't even singe my whiskers!

hull_50.text: Let's hope this is the last time we're hit today.
Hey, I'm not complaining, but it's getting pretty hot in here.
Good thing I've purchased the hardened skin back then.
Hull at 50%. Alright, time to get serious.

hull_30.text: Hull at 30%, but we can still make it. Stay focused, team!
Hull integrity at critical levels! Time to show them what humanity's truly made of!
Hull down to third, don't let them hit us, there is still much to do for us in this life!
Someone, take care of that fire for fuck's sake, my fur's already burned, damnit!

overload.text: Ow! Why didn't they insulate this thing?!
Flux grid's in bad shape, need time to re-engage!

death.text: Oh, wow, so it is indeed beautiful up there...-
See you all in Hell, motherfu-...
Heh... And here I thought I'd buy those extra ears-...

victory.text: Drinks are on me! Not the most expensive though, I still have bills to pay and I've been saving for new limbs for several months alread-...
Good job us! What? No, I'm NOT wagging my tail! You're imagining things!
All in a day's job, amiright?
I still wonder what their flesh tastes like... What? Don't look at me like that.
